choices.name: c_56a04ed7_60a7_4806_b8b0_edbca7791665
choices.choiceText: Rarely. There is one specific task that I have to switch to Classic for.

value.stringValue: Rarely. There is one specific task that I have to switch to Classic for.

choices.name: c_62a79ffe_0336_4ed1_9fda_e94477b49274
choices.choiceText: It's what I am familiar with

value.stringValue: It's what I am familiar with

choices.name: c_75f3e53e_c6d3_457e_9e6c_977b70a2b487
choices.choiceText: I had no idea what the App Launcher was until now

value.stringValue: I had no idea what the App Launcher was until now

choices.name: c_96d50def_4e3a_4beb_a354_d204ded5aae8
choices.choiceText: Sometimes. There are a few specific tasks that I need to use Classic for.

value.stringValue: Sometimes. There are a few specific tasks that I need to use Classic for.

choices.name: c_9de7e34f_0e04_4a0d_ae06_0c290f743ca8
choices.choiceText: Never. Lightning Experience let's me do everything I need to.

value.stringValue: Never. Lightning Experience let's me do everything I need to.

choices.name: c_bbf2ad13_03b3_4dd6_b88e_aa820f20a8ba
choices.choiceText: I prefer the look of Classic compared to Lightning

value.stringValue: I prefer the look of Classic compared to Lightning

choices.name: c_ec475221_67fa_4f08_8180_e13af72722ba
choices.choiceText: Often. I prefer to use Classic for most tasks.

value.stringValue: Often. I prefer to use Classic for most tasks.

choices.name: c_fb241ecb_b74b_4ee3_95ad_1660bf865291
choices.choiceText: I find it easier to accomplish certain tasks in Classic

value.stringValue: I find it easier to accomplish certain tasks in Classic

screens.name: p_0fe7f214_5ca3_4872_a12e_33b1ef7b4d5a
screens.label: Menu Tab Usage

fields.name: q_12d45c47_461d_4fa2_8955_bab76da32081
fields.fieldText:
Which of the following menu tabs do you use? (select all that apply)


Menu tabs are used to select which type of record you want to interact with as seen below:

fields.name: q_16c58afc_f2a6_4db8_af8e_088d51407892
fields.fieldText: Please list all other Menu Tabs that you use:

screens.pausedText: To pick up where you left off, refresh this page, or open the survey again.

screens.name: p_39317d84_4810_4323_b790_8951f3043e89
screens.label: App Usage

fields.name: q_3fd540f7_d1a0_4f99_9ed6_e1d2db5496ad
fields.fieldText:
Which of the following Apps do you use? (select all that apply)


If you are not familiar with Apps they control what set of menu options you have access to and how the different page layouts look. They can be chosen from the App Launcher at the top left of the screen (it looks like nine dots). The current App you are using is listed on the right of the App Launcher. In this case it is Sales.

fields.name: q_f1f55cfc_3829_42c1_9fed_fd421022781c
fields.fieldText: Please list any other Apps that you use:

screens.pausedText: To pick up where you left off, refresh this page, or open the survey again.

screens.name: p_932da272_b6cb_475d_86d1_192f5404190b
screens.label: Overall Salesforce Satisfaction

fields.name: q_41e50edd_d448_475f_8966_d80334db51f6
fields.fieldText: In general, how would you rate your Salesforce user experience?
fields.helpText: 0 = I hate it 5 = Super awesome, nothing I'd change

fields.name: q_76e8297a_e2b2_4cd7_9fc6_1f2facb787a7
fields.fieldText: Please briefly describe any areas that you are not satisfied with.

fields.name: q_74b17b06_e4cf_4956_a55a_ebfa298da978
fields.fieldText: Are there any features that you would like to see added?

screens.pausedText: To pick up where you left off, refresh this page, or open the survey again.

screens.name: p_a5e0f50f_353a_4bc2_83f2_9fd9bb46f577
screens.label: Classic Environment

fields.name: q_7d9a8815_be9b_48bb_b039_6aa92f8866da
fields.fieldText: How often do you switch to Salesforce Classic from the Lightning Experience?
fields.helpText: Our goal is to move towards using Lightning Experience for all tasks. Identifying those tasks which still need to be done in Salesforce Classic will help us to optimize them for Lightning.

fields.name: q_3970e09a_4e24_45bd_ab90_c2e9c80388d3
fields.fieldText: Why do you prefer the Classic environment? (select all that apply)

fields.name: q_9a7a5cd1_ff19_43b3_950f_aee6e22f598e
fields.fieldText: Please describe the specific task(s) you use Classic for:

fields.name: q_f4edbfc6_2299_4bc2_b5c4_0abb25a67802
fields.fieldText:
Salesforce Classic is the old workspace that looks like this:


It has been replaced by the Lightning Experience that looks like this:


You can switch between the two when needed by selecting View Profile at the top right (it looks like a photo of you or a generic person in a bear suit), but at some point Classic will be phased out.

screens.pausedText: To pick up where you left off, refresh this page, or open the survey again.

screens.name: p_d2621f08_1e78_4663_8253_ee237724077b
screens.label: Mobile App Usage

fields.name: q_d953188b_1d34_4e98_9399_8c843dfb02ae
fields.fieldText: What percentage of your Salesforce use is on a phone or tablet using the Salesforce mobile app?
fields.helpText: A value of 100 means you only use your phone or tablet to access Salesforce. A value of 0 means you only use your computer to access Salesforce.

screens.pausedText: To pick up where you left off, refresh this page, or open the survey again.

textTemplates.name: thankYouLabelTextTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Thank you for completing the Gusmer Sales User Survey!


Your participation is appreciated!

textTemplates.name: welcome_question_lref_tt
textTemplates.text:
Welcome to the Gusmer Sales User Survey!


Please take a few minutes to answer the questions on the following pages so we can prioritize Salesforce development efforts and identify any areas that need our attention.


Thank you,

The Gusmer Salesforce Administration Team
